content: Place a piece of Luca Fruit on the branch, and, in turn, the mountains, sky, sand, and sea — the very essence of our planet — will be transformed.
info: 种子星和露卡-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A笑哈哈}Congratulations, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! The Luca Arbor has grown a new branch, and now there's a space for a <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit</style> at its tip.
info: 种子星和露卡-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Well, seeing is believing. Here's a <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit</style>, prepared for you by Loomi Co. You may try placing it on the Luca Arbor...
info: 种子星和露卡-莫白-复杂对话_主流程文本II
